data.name: A2C:Ayry seems to be playtesting a 2D runner shooter from Cci
data.detailed_description:
TL;DR


Shoot
Dodge
Run
SUPERHOT
(opps wrong game)
Hotel?Trivago

((Warning: Game contains flashy RGB bullets that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition.))

Story:

TL;DR

The leader of the nation has went missing again from work!
And its up to Ayry to get the leader(CcI) back to the work office
by play-testing the game Cci made?

Features:

  • 2D runner shump gameplay where you shoot and dodge and shoot and dodge.
  • Its a runner but its also a shoot-em up!
  • You are forced to run forward but you can control how fast you want to go.
  • A casual and chill story between 2 characters having fun at somewhere on the land of .
  • C00L backgrounds.
  • RGB Bullets.
  • A lot of RGB bullets.
  • Different endings(probably).
  • Bullet time mechanic to help you against the swarm of RGB bullets.
  • Created (mostly) by one person.
  • Sorry, no dogs yet.
  • Wonderful soundtrack from Rengoku Teien(煉獄庭園) and other composer.
  • A kill counter for score chasers!

Q&A


Q:How much of hours of fun can i expect from this game?
A:i will update this answer when the game is finished and asking people to play test it.

Q:What is the meaning of life?
A:There is no meaning of life.The meaning of life is something you create and decide for yourself.

Q:How will the game be priced?
A:Based on how long it takes to beat the game on average,1 hour = 1 usd.

Q:What is this game inspired by?
A:Rabi-Rabi,Alternative Sphere,WPNfire,i forgot the rest

Q:What is a meme?
A:A miserable little pile of ideas.

Q:How much time have you spend on this game so far?
A:The project started from 26 March 2022 00:40 with 1619.5 hours of dev time.

Q:why
A:Life is short and painful,enjoy fresh air and have fun when you can.

data.short_description: A 2D runner shump(shoot-em up) where you may or may not save a nation by beating a game. Shoot and dodge bullets while you keep running and gunning!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 15% of a intel i5-10500 CPU @3.10GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: somehow the bloom effect is eating a lot of gpu resource so i have no idea
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: Requires a keyboard and a mouse to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 9+1
  • Processor: 20% of a intel i5-10500 CPU @3.10GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA geForce GTX 1660 before the bloom issue is fixed lmao
  • Storage: 1337 MB available space
  • Sound Card: yes
  • Additional Notes: also requires a human to interact with the game(i mean a cat is fine too)

release_date.date: I HAVE NO IDEA,hopefully before i expire
